title: Single Shot MultiBox Detector (SSD) Implementation with PyTorch
description: This notebook demonstrates the implementation of the Single Shot MultiBox Detector (SSD) object detection model using PyTorch. It utilizes a pre-trained VGG16 backbone and is trained on the Pascal VOC dataset. The notebook includes data loading, model definition, training, and visualization steps.
usage:
1. Install the required dependencies using `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
2. Download the Pascal VOC 2012 dataset.
3. Run the notebook cells sequentially.
4. Modify parameters as needed for your specific use case.
